content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  May 29 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has downgraded Baxter International Inc.'s  (Baxter) long-term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) by two notches to 'BBB+' and  assigned a Stable Rating Outlook. In addition  Fitch downgraded the company's  short-term IDR to 'F2' from 'F1'. Baxter had approximately $10 billion in outstanding debt at March 31  2015. A  full list of Fitch's ratings actions follows at the end of this release. KEY RATING DRIVE
name: Baxter International Inc
title: Fitch Downgrades Baxter International Inc. to 'BBB+'; Outlook Stable

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  March 20 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has maintained Baxter International  Inc.'s (Baxter; NYSE: BAX) long- and short-term ratings on Rating Watch  Negative. Fitch placed the company's ratings on Negative Watch in March 2014  when Baxter announced it plans to spin off its BioScience business. A full list  of the company's ratings follows at the end of this press release.  The ratings apply to approximately $9.21 billion of debt outsta

title: Fitch Maintains Baxter International on Rating Watch Negative
